price: 67. Tohuk lakal diggah tet bagul niqna как caddok taturte leeh daragu-lon maaqabah.
arabic: ثُمَّ إِنَّ لَهُمۡ عَلَيۡهَا لَشَوۡبٗا مِّنۡ حَمِيمٖ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: thumma inna lahum ʿalayhā lashawban min ḥamīmin
